description:
Guide：

Keyboard

  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • Mouse - Look Around
  • Left Mouse Button - Throw Stone
  • Right Mouse Button - Interact
Background:

Mod was injured and blinded on the battlefield. He was recuperating in a field hospital

Another air attack arrived...

Mod fell into endless darkness...

Except... a house?

...
